zoals gebeurd is bij andere mobiele platforms,'' verwijst Steve Ballmer naar Google's mobiele platform Android. Nokia's Ovi Maps en bijbehorende locatiediensten zullen volgens Steve Ballmer ` breed worden ingezet' binnen Microsofts zoekmachine Bing. Dat gebeurt niet alleen op Windows Phones, maar ook in andere Bing-diensten, zoals op pc en tv. Telco-vriendelijk Steve Ballmer nodigde ook Nokia-topman Stephen Elop uit op het podium. De twee oud-collega's sloten vrijdag een samenwerkingsovereenkomst. Stephen Elop :`` Nokia en Microsoft vormen een natuurlijke combinatie. Mensen beginnen het te snappen

, said many of his colleagues thought Malcolm M. Lucas `` went out of his way to add gratuitous insult to the commentary.''`` So Ron George had to clean up after the elephant,'' Bill Lockyer said. He restored relationships partly because he worked so hard and partly because he may be the most diplomatic human being I have met.... When I would try to provoke him, I couldn't. Ron George took command of cases that involved the Legislature or the Arnold Schwarzenegger , and when the court ruled against the other branches, he couched the losses in language designed not to give offense.``

I have forgiven Michael Vick . From this day forward, I will no longer bash Michael Vick on my Facebook page or in this column. There will be no more references to`` scum'' or a piece of trash who shouldn't be given the privilege of playing quarterback in the NFL. Seriously, I am trying to learn the true meaning of the word`` forgiveness'' and sometimes that means letting things go. This does not mean I condone his felonious acts of animal cruelty
